cml:text.name: response_test_nums
cml:text.label: Numbers
cml:text.instructions: Please enter the numbers spoken at the end of the clip with no spaces, e.g. 12

cml:textarea.name: response_test_desc
cml:textarea.label: Descriptive tags
cml:textarea.instructions: Please enter a few words to describe this sound, separate by commas, e.g. "bird, chirp, outdoors, loud, pleasant"

cml:ratings.name: response_test_pc
cml:ratings.label: Perceptual convincingness
cml:ratings.instructions: Please rate how perceptually convincing this test clip is.

p:
https://envmixer.s3.amazonaws.com/simple-182085/{{s1_hash}}.mp3 Play Source 1 clip.
(https://envmixer.s3.amazonaws.com/simple-182085/{{test_hash}}.mp3 Repeat test clip if needed.)

cml:text.name: response_s1_nums
cml:text.label: Numbers
cml:text.instructions: Please enter the numbers spoken at the end of the clip with no spaces, e.g. 12

cml:textarea.name: response_s1_desc
cml:textarea.label: Descriptive tags
cml:textarea.instructions: Please enter a few words to describe this sound, separate by commas, e.g. "bird, chirp, outdoors, loud, pleasant"

cml:ratings.name: response_s1_sim
cml:ratings.label: Similarity to Test clip
cml:ratings.instructions: Please rate how similar this source clip is to the test clip.
